title: Fostering Digital Citizenship: Customized Game-Based Mathematics Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Strengthening ethical technology use competencies through mathematical problem-solving in personalized digital game environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain data privacy protection principles with over 80% accuracy through digital game-based simulations.
Learners can iteratively improve decision-making scenarios in digital environments three or more times using mathematical modeling techniques.
Learners can collaboratively develop ethical solutions that meet or exceed 4 points (on a 5-point scale) on the digital citizenship assessment rubric in cooperative projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
